card.name: AURA OF INVULNERABILITY
card.text: Play on any OCCULT Adversary to reduce damage from all opponent LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT sources by 1 this round.

card.name: FIRST AID
card.text: Play on any Agent in the Field to immediately Heal one point of damage.

card.name: FACE-OFF
card.text: Play this card during a LONG RANGE COMBAT round on a combatant you control with an LRC skill. That combatant and one other combatant of the owning player's choice will deal no damage in this LRC round.

card.name: RENDING CLAWS
card.text: Play on any PRIMORDIAL or OCCULT Adversary to add 1 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

card.name: FAST STRIKE
card.text: Play this card on any combatant with a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill of three or more to allow that combatant to attack twice in a CRC round.

card.name: SNEAK ATTACK
card.text: Play on any EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to allow it to deal all of its damage in the round before its opponents. Any opponents sent to the Hospital as a result of this damage do not cause damage this round.

card.name: AMBUSH
card.text: Play this card on any combatant with a SUBTERFUGE skill of 1+ or that is capable of using SUBTERFUGE cards. The opposing side's LONG RANGE COMBAT attack is negated this round.

card.name: KICK
card.text: Play on any Combatant that can use MARTIAL ARTS or any combatant opposing a stunned opponent. Add 2 to the combatant's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT damage result this round.

card.name: GUN JAMMED
card.text: Negates the effects of any one Equipment card that adds to LONG RANGE COMBAT Skill for the duration of this combat.

card.name: HIDE
card.text: Play this on one combatant with a SUBTERFUGE skill of 1+ or that is capable of using SUBTERFUGE cards. No damage may be dealt to that combatant in this round and the combatant deals no damage.

card.name: DODGE
card.text: Play this card on any combatant in a LONG RANGE COMBAT round to reduce the damage from any one source by four points. The combatant using this card does not deal damage in this LRC round.

card.name: NERVE STRIKE
card.text: Play on any combatant that can use MARTIAL ARTS to add 2 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill in this round. In addition, the opponent is considered "stunned" for the next round of combat. The opponent will deal no damage in the next round of combat.

card.name: WEBBED
card.text: Play on any PRIMORDIAL Adversary to add 1 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skil and prevent all damage from one opponent this round.

card.name: VICIOUS FANGS
card.text: Play on any PRIMORDIAL or OCCULT Adversary to add 2 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

card.name: Spin Kick
card.text: Combatants that can use MARTIAL ARTS may play this card to add 3 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill this round.

card.name: MIND CONTROL
card.text: Play on any OCCULT or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to cause one Agent to allocate all damage to a target of the Adversary's choice this round (including other Agents).

card.name: ALIEN STEALTH TECHNOLOGY
card.text: Play on any ALIEN combatant to reduce damage from all opponent LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT sources by 1 this round.

card.name: BLOCK AND ATTACK
card.text: Combatants that can use MARTIAL ARTS may use this card to negate two points of damage and still deal their normal damage in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round.

card.name: BLOCK
card.text: Play this card on any combatant in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round to reduce the damage from any one source by four points. The combatant using this card does not deal damage in this CRC round.

card.name: BODY ARMOR
card.text: Play on any GOVERNMENT Adversary to reduce damage from all opponent LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT sources by one this round.

card.name: DISARM
card.text: Adversaries that can use MARTIAL ARTS may play this card in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round to cause one Equipment card from the opposing side to be discarded. If the Equipment normally adds to CRC skill check, then it is discarded before it may do so.

card.name: RUNNING GUN BATTLE
card.text: Combatants with a LONG RANGE COMBAT skill of 3+ may use this card to fight one additional round of LRC immediately.

card.name: FASCINATION
card.text: Play on any Adversary to add 1 to its CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill check. In addition, if the Adversary is OCCULT, play on the chosen Agent in combat to negate his combat skills this round.

card.name: INTERNAL BLEEDING
card.text: Play on any Agent that has taken two or more points of damage from a single damage source. That Agent must go to the Hospital immediately and may no longer participate in the combat. The Agent may not leave the Hospital until he is fully healed.

card.name: COVERING FIRE
card.text: Play on any GOVERNMENT Adversary to allow it to split the LONG RANGE COMBAT damage it causes amongst its opponents this round.

card.name: NO WAY OUT
card.text: Play this card to negate the effects of any combat card that ends combat. The Cost of this card is equal to the Cost of the opponent's card that ended the combat or 2 *P, whichever is greater.

card.name: HARD PUNCH
card.text: Play on any combatant in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round. Add one to the combatant's damage result.

card.name: CHOKE HOLD
card.text: Play this card on any combatant that can use MARTIAL ARTS. The combatant applies a choke hold. If the combatant causes damage in CLOSE RANGE COMBAT then the damaged Adversary/Agent takes no further part in the combat.

card.name: FAST DRAW
card.text: Play on any one combatant who would not normally be allowed to fight a round of LONG RANGE COMBAT. The combatant must still have LRC skill. The combatant may fight one round of LRC as normal.

card.name: WATCH OUT!
card.text: Play this card when your opponent is about to assign damage. You now choose which of the Agents or Adversaries under your control take the damage. The damage may not be split unless you play a card that allows you to do so.

card.name: HIT AND RUN
card.text: One Agent equipped with a "Government Car" may use this card to make one CLOSE RANGE COMBAT attack at CRC skill: 6. Any damage allocated to the Agent is taken by the car first. The car is destroyed after taking six hits. Hits in excess of thos needed to destroy the car are applied to the Agent. Discard the "Government Car" card after this combat round is resolved.

card.name: HANDCUFF
card.text: Play this card in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round after damage has been dealt. If the Agents dealt two or more points more damage than their opponent, combat ends immediately. In addition, place the opposing Adversary in the Agents' Bureau section. The player may discard this card at any time to add two points of damage to any future combat involving an Adversary with the same Keywords.

card.name: ILLUSIONARY FOE
card.text: Play on any OCCULT or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to negate all damage allocated to that Adversary this round.

card.name: RUN FOR IT!
card.text: Play this card on any Agent to immediately end combat for that Agent. Finish the combat without the Agent. The Agent takes no damage from the combat and may still contribute his skills to other skill checks.

card.name: TERMINAL DAMAGE
card.text: Play on any Agent that has taken 5 or more damage from a single damage source. That Agent must go to the Hospital immediately and may no longer participate in the combat. The Agent cannot leave the Hospital until fully healed. Subtract 5 from the Agent's Cost. If the Cost is zero or less, the Agent is removed from the game. (Agents Lamana, Willis, Purdue and Weiss are immune to this effect.)

card.name: FLAMING WALL
card.text: Play on any EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to cause one point of damage to each opponent in a LONG RANGE COMBAT round. This is in addition to any other damage caused by the Adversary in this round.

card.name: MASSIVE INTERNAL DAMAGE
card.text: Play on any Agent that has taken four or more points of damage from a single damage source. That Agent must go to the Hospital immediately and may no longer participate in the combat. The Agent may not leave the Hospital until fully healed. Subtract 4 from the Agent's Cost. If the result is zero or less, the Agent is removed from the game. (Agents Lamana, Willis, Purdue, and Weiss are immune to this effect).

card.name: SEMI-JACKETED HOLLOW POINTS
card.text: Play this card on any combatant in a LONG RANGE COMBAT round to add 2 points to that combatant's LRC skill.

card.name: STUNNING BLOW
card.text: Play this on any opponent who has just taken damage. The opponent is considered "stunned" for the next round of combat. This opponent will deal no damage in the next round of combat.

card.name: TAKE COVER!
card.text: Play this card on any combatant to decrease damage from one LONG RANGE COMBAT source by two points this round.

card.name: ENERGY STRIKE
card.text: Play on any ALIEN or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to add 3 to any LONG RANGE COMBAT skill check. If the Adversary does not have LRC skill, this card gives it a 3 for this round only.

card.name: DETECTIVE KELLY RYAN
card.text: Play to change one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION, BEHAVIORAL, or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card to Keyword MOTIVE.

card.name: SINUS CAVITY IMPLANT
card.text: Play on one Agent to decrease the Agent's RES value by one. This card is removed when a Healing cad is played on the Agent.

card.name: PETER TANAKA
card.text: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to OBSERVATION 3+.

card.name: SECTION CHIEF JOSEPH MCGRATH
card.text: Force one Agent (your choice) back to the Bureau immediately. The Agent may not contribute to any skill checks this turn.

card.name: CIGARETTE BUTTS
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: OCCULT INVESTIGATION, BEHAVIORAL, BUREAUCRACY. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: OCCULT INVESTIGATION, BEHAVIORAL, BUREAUCRACY. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: SHERIFF DANIELS
card.text: Play to change a Site Prerequisite to SUBTERFUGE 3+.

card.name: DR. BERUBE
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, MEDICAL, SCIENCES. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, MEDICAL, SCIENCES. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: THE OVERCOAT MAN
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: MEDICAL, OBSERVATION, BEHAVIORAL. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: MEDICAL, OBSERVATION, BEHAVIORAL. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: YOU'VE GOT A TAIL
card.text: Play after a Team investigates a Site to destroy one Event RESOURCE.

card.name: PETE CALCAGNI
card.text: Play to force your opponent to discard one Witness RESOURCE immediately.

card.name: HOLTZMAN, D.S.A.
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, COMPUTER. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, COMPUTER. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: CLAUDE PETERSON
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, SUBTERFUGE, COMPUTER. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, SUBTERFUGE, COMPUTER. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: THE CONUNDRUM
card.text: Play to negate one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION card.

card.name: PAUL MOSSINGER
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, OBSERVATION, SUBTERFUGE. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, OBSERVATION, SUBTERFUGE. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: INTRUDER COUNTER-MEASURES PROGRAM
card.text: Play to add 2 to your pool immediately

card.name: DR. AARON MONTE
card.text: Play to change one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION, MEDICAL, or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card to Keyword MOTIVE.

card.name: POISONOUS GASES
card.text: Force an opposing Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check. If they fail, each Agent takes one point of damage. If one of the Agents has a "Gas Chromatograph", then this card has no effect.

card.name: LASER BARRIER
card.text: Play to preent one Agent assigned to a Site from contributing the Agent's skills to one skill check (your choice) that the Team makes this turn.

card.name: NASTY SURPRISE
card.text: Play to add five tokens to your pool.

card.name: SLEEP DEPRIVATION
card.text: Decrease all of the skill levels on one Agent (your choice) by 1 for this turn only.

card.name: RADIOACTIVE AREA
card.text: Increase a Site Prerequisite by one point (i.e., Prerequisite: Skill 5+ becomes Skill 6+). In addition, if the Team fails the skill check, each Agent on the Team takes one point of damage. If one of the Agents has a "Geiger Counter", this card has no effect.

card.name: GHOST IN THE MACHINE
card.text: Play to change one Keyword COMPUTER, SCIENCES, or SUBTERFUGE card to Keyword RESULT.

card.name: UNNATURAL AGING
card.text: Force the Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check. If they fail, choose one Agent to go to the Hospital. The chosen Agent permanently loses one HEALTH. An Agent's permanent HEALTH can never be reduced below 1.

card.name: CAR TROUBLES
card.text: Play on a Team of three or more Agents moving to the same Site. The Team may only send two Agents to that Site (owning player's choice). Any extra Agents remain in the Team but may not contribute their skills to any checks this turn. In addition, playing this card will prevent the use of the "Evasive Maneuver" card by this Team this turn.

card.name: PUZZLES WITHIN PUZZLES
card.text: Play to negate one Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card.

card.name: GOVERNMENT COVER-UP
card.text: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: SCIENCES, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, BUREAUCRACY. Advanced Game: Pay the listed Cost, where X = the number of paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: SCIENCES, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, BUREAUCRACY. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4

card.name: HAZARDOUS SAMPLE
card.text: Play to force the Investigating player to discard all Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION cards in his hand.

card.name: HENRY TRONDHEIM
card.text: Force the Team investigation a Site to discard one Equipment card of your choice.

card.name: DETECTIVE MILES
card.text: Pay 1 to move up to 2 from your opponent's pool to your pool immediately.

card.name: DETECTIVE THOMPSON
card.text: Play to change a Site Prerequisite to BUREAUCRACY 3+.

card.name: HARRY COKELY
card.text: Play to change one Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION, BEHAVIORAL, or OBSERVATION card to Keyword METHOD.

card.name: DETECTIVE TONY FIORE
card.text: Play to cause your opponent to discard two cards at random from his hand immediately.

card.name: WARREN JAMES DUPR, THE LAZARUS MAN
ALIEN DNA STEROID PROGRAM (PROJECT PURITY CONTROL)
THE VAMPIRE, A.K.A. THE UNHOLY SPIRIT
MRS. PADDOCK, A.K.A. THE DARK ANGEL
SECTION CHIEF SCOTT BLEVINS
card.text: Treat Section Chief Blevins as a RES 2 if he is in the Bureau Section. If he is in the Bureau Section, he may contribute to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resources Pool during the Briefing Phase.

card.name: ALBERT HOSTEEN
card.text: Place a token on Hosteen's card. Discard a token to examine your opponent's hand. Select any one Conspiracy card in your opponent's hand show it to your opponent. If your opponent plays that card at any time in the game, you may immediately ask one question about the X-File. This question may only be asked the first time the card is played.

card.name: AGENT ALEX KRYCEK
card.text: Agent Krycek allows you to choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during the Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT FOX MULDER
card.text: s generated by Agent Mulder must be used to purchase cards. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to play a Site for zero cost.

card.name: LT. BRIAN TILLMAN, AUBREY POLICE DEPARTMENT
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword EQUIPMENT or COMBAT cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT RICH
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION or SUBTERFUGE cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT LUCY KAZDIN
card.text: If one of your Agents is Abducted, you may immediately draw two cards.

card.name: AGENT JACK WILLIS
card.text: Place a token on this card. Discard a token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Site that asks an AFFILIATION question. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

card.name: INSPECTOR PHOEBE GREEN
card.text: Place a token on this card. Discard a token to move Agent Fox Mulder from anywhere on the table to the Team Phoebe Green is in. Mulder may assist in any skill check made by the team. In this manner, Mulder may assist on two Sites in one turn.

card.name: AGENT FOX MULDER
card.text: s generated by Agent Mulder must be used to purchase cards. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to play a Site for zero cost.

card.name: AGENT ALEX KRYCEK
card.text: Agent Krycek allows you to choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during the Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT NANCY SPILLER
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword COMPUTER or SCIENCES cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT DANA SCULLY
card.text: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to examine any one Bluff card. Place Bluff card back on the Site after examining.

card.name: AGENT DANA SCULLY
card.text: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to examine any one Bluff card. Place Bluff card back on the Site after examining.

card.name: ASSISTANT DIRECTOR WALTER SKINNER
card.text: Treat Assistant Director Skinner as a RES 3 if he is in the Bureau Section of the table.

card.name: DR. CHARLES BURK
card.text: Place one token on this card. Discard a token to negate one OCCULT Adversary.

card.name: AGENT TOM COLTON
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT JANUS, TRAINED MEDIC
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword MEDICAL or HEALING cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase. In addition, if Janus is in the Field Section, he may "heal" one point of damage on another Agent in his Team, once per turn. This may prevent an Agent from going to the Hospital.

card.name: AGENT MOE BOCKS
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase.

card.name: AGENT REGGIE PURDUE
card.text: Place a token on this card. Discard this token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Site that asks a RESULT question. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

card.name: ASSISTANT DIRECTOR WALTER SKINNER
card.text: Treat Assistant Director Skinner as a RES 3 if he is in the Bureau Section of the table.

card.name: AGENT WEISS
card.text: Place a token on this card. Discard a token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Site that asks a METHOD question. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

card.name: AGENT JERRY LAMANA
card.text: Once per game, when Agent Lamana is part of a Team investigating a Site in the Investigation Phase, he may force his opponent to show the cards in his hand. Lamana may then steal any one card. He may use it immediately in the investigation. You must still pay for the card. Whether you use it or not, place it in its owner's Discard Pile at the end of the turn.

card.name: AGENT KAREN KOSSEFF, COUNSELOR
card.text: Place 1 on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword BEHAVIORAL or OBSERVATION cards. If you use this , replace it during your Briefing Phase.

card.name: SHERIFF SPENCER
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: DR. BLOCKHEAD
card.text: Negates one EVOLUTIONARY CREATURE.

card.name: THE THINKER
card.text: Change one Keyword to any other one Keyword on a card playd by your opponent.

card.name: BYERS
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check.

card.name: EMIL AND ZOE
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check.

card.name: DR. DAVEY
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's SCIENCES skill check.

card.name: BILLY MILES
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: DR. DIAMOND
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check once during your turn.

card.name: DETECTIVE FRANK BRIGGS
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: DR. GRISSOM
card.text: Adds 1 to your pool every time a Keyword EVOLUTIONARY or BEHAVIORAL card is played.

card.name: KEVIN MORRIS, A.K.A. THE CONDUIT
card.text: Adds 1 to your pool every time a Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION card is played.

attr.value: Witness, Alien Investigation, Evidence Collection, Resource

card.name: DETECTIVE SHARON LAZARD
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.

card.name: DR. LASKOS
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's MEDICAL skill check.

card.name: THE CALUSARI
card.text: Negates one OCCULT CREATURE.

card.name: BILL MULDER
card.text: Adds 2 to one Agent's SUBTERFUGE skill check. Alternately, any card that would send Fox Mulder to the Hospital may be negated by playing the Bill Mulder card. If played in this way, rmove Bill Mulder from the game.

card.name: CHARLEY TSKANY
card.text: Attach this Witness to a Team. This Witness will add his skills to the appropriate skill check like an Agent, CRC: 2, LRC: 2, and HEALTH: 3. If he is sent to the Hospital, or at any time there are no Agents in the Team, rmove the card from the game.

card.name: DR. OSBORNE
card.text: Adds 1 to your pool every time a Keyword GOVERNMENT or MEDICAL card is played.

card.name: MICHELLE GENEROO
card.text: Adds 1 to your pool every time a Keyword COMPUTER or BUREAUCRACY card is played.

card.name: SIR MALCOLM MARSDEN
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY skill check.

card.name: SAMANTHA MULDER
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's SUBTERFUGE skill checkk once per turn. You may have any number of Samantha Mulder cards in play.

card.name: MAX FENIG
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check. Alternately, you may play this card when one of your Agents is thee target of an abduction. Max Fenig is abducted instead. Discard Max Fenig. The abduction is negated.

card.name: DR. HODGE
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's MEDICAL skill check.

card.name: DOUG SPINNEY
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's SCIENCES skill check.

card.name: DR. SHEILA BRAUN
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check.

card.name: U.S. MARSHALL TAPIA
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.

card.name: BRAD WILCZEK
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check.

card.name: DR. NOLLETTE
card.text: Adds 1 to your pool every time a Keyword SCIENCES or OBSERVATION card is played.

card.name: ISH--TRIBAL ELDER
card.text: Adds 2 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: SHERIFF MAZEROSKI
card.text: Negates one GOVERNMENT PAWN

card.name: LT. COLONEL MARCUS AURELIUS BELT
card.text: Negates one ALIEN CREATURE.

card.name: GUNG BITUEN
card.text: Attach this Witness to a Team. Enables your Agents to deal damage to OCCULT CREATUREs as normal. For example, you may use LRC against POLTERGEISTs and VAMPIREs. If at any time there are no Agents in the Team to which this card is attached, discard this card.

card.name: KRISTEN KILAR
card.text: Adds 1 to your pool every time a Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card is played.

attr.value: Witness, Criminal Investigation, Occult Investigation, Resource

card.name: GERD THOMAS
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check.

card.name: DR. DANIEL TREPKOS
card.text: Negates one PRIMORDIAL CREATURE.

card.name: MAGGIE HOLVEY
card.text: Adds 1 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: LUTHER LEE BOGGS
card.text: Play this card at anytime during your turn to examine your opponent's hand.

card.name: SENATOR RICHARD MATHESON
card.text: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this resource when all tokens have been discarded.

card.name: SUCCESSFUL DIAGNOSIS
card.text: Place on a Team in the Hospital containing an injured Agent. The Agent heals 2 damage immediately.

card.name: DEEP THROAT
card.text: Ask any one Characteristic question regarding one opponent's X-File. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card may not be negated.

card.name: SHUTTING DOWN THE X-FILES
card.text: Play on any Team containing Agent Fox Mulder and/or Agent Dana Scully. Mulder must immediately be moved to the Bureau. Scully must immediately be moved to the Hospital (undamaged). Neither my contribute their skills to skill checks this turn.

card.name: REPORTERS AT THE CRIME SCENE
card.text: Play when one player has just asked a Characteristic question and you were not the Directed player. If the player achieved the prerequisite skill number exactly, then he must tell all opponents the answer to the Characteristic question.

card.name: I WANT TO BELIEVE
card.text: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: ROAD TRIP
card.text: Play on a Team in the Field during the Deployment Phase. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 6+ skill check they may investigate two Sites this turn. Resolve each Site individually.

card.name: HIDDEN TRANSMITTER
card.text: Play after an opponent Team successfully asks a Characteristc question. Force that opponent Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they fail they must tell you the question and answer they obtained.

card.name: MEDICAL TREATMENT
card.text: Play on an Agent in the Hospital. The Agent heals one token of damage immediately.

card.name: AGENT WEISS KILLED BY UNKNOWN TOXIN
card.text: If your opponent includes Agent Weiss in any skill check in the Field, Agent Weiss is instantly killed and removed from the game.

card.name: THE CIGARETTE-SMOKING MAN STRIKES
card.text: Change any Keyword to any other Keyword on a card played by your opponent. This effect lasts until the end of the turn.

card.name: EVE 7
card.text: Move any Bluff cards from one Site to another Site or back into the owner's hand. If at the end of an Investigation Phase a Site is left with no Bluffs attached, discard it. X = 1 per Bluff removed.

card.name: STREET CONTACTS
card.text: Search through your Bureau Deck and place any one Witness card in your hand. Show the Witness to your opponents. Shuffle the Bureau Deck.

card.name: GOVERNMENT ARRESTS SUSPECTS
card.text: Negate one Witness that modifies ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY skill.

card.name: RED TAPE
card.text: Play during the Briefing Phase to prevent one opponent from drawing any cards during the remainder of this turn.

card.name: S.W.A.T. TRAINING
card.text: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: LRC, CRC or the ability to use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

card.name: FINGERPRINTS
card.text: Play on one Team in the Field. If the Team makes an EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check 5+, then they may add 2 to any Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

card.name: BACK TRACKING PROGRAM
card.text: Play this card to negate any Keyword COMPUTER card.

card.name: AGENT LAMANA DIES IN FATAL ELEVATOR ACCIDENT
card.text: If your opponent includes Agent Lamana in any skill check in the Field, Agent Lamana is instantly killed and removed from the game.

card.name: EVIDENCE DESTROYED
card.text: Negate one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION card.

card.name: SURFING THE NET
card.text: Have a Team make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check. If successful, draw three cards from your chosen opponent's Bureau deck and choose one to place in your Bureau Section face down. Place the other two cards back on top of your opponent's Bureau Deck in any order. You may use the chosen card when appropriate but you must pay the cost. Return the card to its owner's Discard Pile after it has been used. Leave this card on top of the card you've taken from your opponent to remind you that the card you took is considered an EVENT, RESOURCE.

card.name: GOVERNMENT SANCTIONED PHEROMONE EXPERIMENTS
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check. If the Team fails, you may choose an opposing Agent on the Team to enter combat with any other Agent on the Team. Combat will only last one round.

card.name: THOROUGH DOCUMENTATION
card.text: Play prior to a Site skill check. If the Site skill check is successful, place this card in your Bureau Section. You may discard this card in any of your investigation phases to add 2 to a Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

card.name: SKINNER CHOOSES A SIDE
card.text: Play when Assistant Director Walter Skinner is in the Bureau Section of the table and the AFFILIATION of your opponent's X-File is known. Add the following modifiers to Skinner's skills: +1 BUREAUCRACY, +1 SUBTERFUGE. Skinner is now immune to the "Skinner Adopts The Company Line" card. Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token to negate one Event card. Place this card below Skinner to remind you of the increased skills.

card.name: OVERWHELMING FORCE
card.text: You may now play up to three Adversary cards simultaneously. All cards played using this card count as one Adversary card for game purposes (e.g., the "Overwhelming Force" card and all Adversaries can be negated as one card). The Adversaries all deal damage and take damage separately.

card.name: WARNING FROM THE LOA
card.text: Force an opponent player to reveal any Adversary cards in his hand. If your opponent has one or more, discard one at random.

card.name: EVIDENCE OVERLOOKED
card.text: If the Team makes an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check, they gain a +1 to the Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

card.name: MESSAGE FROM THE STARS
card.text: Negate one ALIEN Adversary. In addition, if the Team makes an ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check 6+, they may ask either one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

card.name: DANA SCULLY, ABDUCTED
card.text: If an Abduction card is played on a Team of Agents that includes Scully, Scully must be the Agent abducted instead. When Agent Scully returns to play she has the following modifiers added to her skills: +1 ALIEN INVESTIGATION, +1 OCCULT INVESTIGATION, +1 OBSERVATION, Keyword BELIEVER. Place this card below Scully to remind you of the increased skills. Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token to search through your Bureau deck and add any Healing card to your hand. Show it to your opponent and shuffle your deck.

card.name: READING THE SIGNS
card.text: Play on any Team in the Field. If the Team makes an OCCULT INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check, they may take 2 from their opponent's Conspiracy Pool and add them to their Resource Pool.

card.name: AGENT JACK WILLIS SHOT TO DEATH IN BANK ROBBERY
card.text: If your opponent includes Agent Willis in any skill check in the Field, Agent Willis is instantly killed and removed from the game.

card.name: SKINNER ADOPTS THE COMPANY LINE
card.text: Play whenever Assistant Director Walter Skinner is involved in a skill check. Skinner must go back to the Bureau (if he is not already there) and may not contribute his skills to any skill check this turn.

card.name: SAFE HOUSE
card.text: Play on any Witness with a skill modifier to permanently add the Keywords EVENT and RESOURCE to the Witness. Thus, the Witness acts as an EVENT, RESOURCE card and remains in play. Place this card below the Witness to remind you of the effect.

card.name: CROP CIRCLES
card.text: Play after one of your Teams successfully investigates a Site with ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill as a prerequisite. Place this card in your Bureau. Discard this card to add 1 to an ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: LANGLY
card.text: Force one Bluff card attached to a Site to be discarded. If there are several Bluffs at the Site, the Bluff to be discarded must be chosen randomly.

card.name: EXPEDITE REQUEST FOR RESOURCES
card.text: Play on a Team in the Bureau. If the Team makes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check then you may search through your Bureau Deck and draw one Equipment card to add to your hand. Show the card to your opponents and then shuffle your deck.

card.name: PAPERWORK
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check or they will be unable to add their skills to a Site skill check this turn.

card.name: UNEXPLAINABLE TIME LOSS
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately

card.name: CLONE
card.text: Play this card on any Witness that has just been played. The owning player must shuffle the Witness back into their Bureau deck immediately and does not benefit from the Witness.

card.name: SUSPECT DESCRIPTION
card.text: Play on a Team that fails a Site skill check when combat was involved. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 3+ skill check, place the Site in the Bureau. At the start of your Briefing Phase, you may place the Site into your hand.

card.name: SMOKE SCREEN
card.text: Play on a Team in the Bureau. If the Team makes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check then designate a Team in the Field. As long as no new members are added to that Team, GOVERNMENT Adversaries may not attack that Team. This card remains in effect until a new Agent is added to the Team.

card.name: DARK FORCES ALIGN
card.text: Play on an opponent Team in any Section. For the rest of the turn, that Team is considered to have a single Characteristic SITE Keyword (i.e., RESULT SITE). You may choose any one Characteristic for the Keyword.

card.name: COMPUTER ACCESS DENIED
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check or they will be unable to complete the skill check.

card.name: IMPROVED CHANNELS
card.text: The Team must make a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check. If successful, you may now have up to ten cards in hand at the end of your turn. This condition stays in effect until you are forced to discard this card. Discard this card if one of your Agents is moved from or to the Bureau Section of the table for any reason.

card.name: THE ERLENMEYER FLASK
card.text: Negates any one card played against your Team during a BUREAUCRACY or ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: KRYCEK, THE DOUBLE AGENT
card.text: Play on Agent Krycek when he is in the Field and is involved in a skill check. Krycek engages one of the Team's Agents (opponent's choice) in Combat. No other Agents may contribute skills to the combat. If Krycek sends the chosen Agent to the Hospital within two rounds of combat, then Krycek stays on the team, otherwise he is removed from play. While Krycek is affected by this card he is considered a GOVERNMENT, MASTER Adversary. Cards that would cause Krycek to be discared simply negate the combat.

card.name: SPYING MISSION
card.text: Play on any Team. If the Team makes a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check, it may use this card to immediately negate any one card that requires them to make a non-combat skill check.

card.name: AUTHORIZED ACCESS ONLY
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they are not successful, they automatically fail the skill check for the Site.

card.name: EQUIPMENT MALFUNCTION
card.text: Force one opponent to discard one piece of equipment (your choice) that does not specifically modify LONG or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT.

card.name: THE LOCAL LAW ENFORCEMENT ARE UNCOOPERATIVE
card.text: Negate one Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card.

card.name: THE LONE GUNMEN
card.text: Play "The Lone Gunmen" card on a Site. While played on a Site, The Lone Gunmen are considered a Keyword WITNESS card. A Site with The Lone Gunmen played on it stays in the Field until they are removed. During your Briefing Phase, pay 1 RP to place a token on the Site. When a Team investigates the Site, each token adds 1 to the skill check. Discard The Lone Gunmen after the skill check is resolved.

card.name: ALIEN DISCRETION
card.text: Play on a Team about to investigate a Site with ALIEN INVESTIGATION as a prerequisite. Discard all cards assigned as Bluff cards at that Site. X = the number of Bluffs at the Site.

card.name: FINGERNAIL SCRAPINGS
card.text: If the Team makes an EVIDENCE COLLECTION 4+ skill check, they gain a +1 to a Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

card.name: TRUST NO ONE
card.text: The Witness's modifier is now changed to a negative (e.g., a +1 becomes a -1). If the Witness has an ability separate from the modifier, this card cancels that ability for this turn.

card.name: LULA PHILLIPS
card.text: Play this card after an Adversary sends any Agent to the Hospital or removes an Agent from the game. Place five tokens in your pool.

card.name: NO PLACE IS SAFE
card.text: For the remainder of this turn, the Bureau is considered to have a single Characteristic SITE Keyword. You may choose any one Characteristic for the Keyword (i.e., RESULT SITE).

card.name: BLACKMAIL
card.text: Play when you have just guessed incorrectly the identity of an X-File. Select a Team in your Bureau. If that Team successfully completes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check, your opponent does not get to ask you a penalty question.

card.name: DISSECTION
card.text: Play this card after a Team of Agents damages an Adversary in combat by dealing enough wounds to kill it. Place five tokens in the pool.

card.name: HACK INTO GOVERNMENT FILES
card.text: Play on a Team to make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check. If successful, you may select any card in your collection and add it to your hand. The card need not be part of your Bureau deck. Nor may it exceed the limit of two cards per deck.

card.name: APPLICATION FOR FBI RESOURCES APPROVED
card.text: If the Team makes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check, you may borrow any one of your opponent's Agents. It may not be an Agent you already control. Add the Agent to the Team for the remainder of the turn. Afterward, the Agent returns to the original owner's control. The Agent must be returned to the Team it belonged to or sent to the Hospital if the Agent was reduced to 0 HEALTH during a combat.

card.name: EXPERT BRIEFING
card.text: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn the Agent may be deployed as normal and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: OBSERVATION, BEHAVIORAL or SUBTERFUGE. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

card.name: ACCESS PERSONNEL FILES
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check. If they fail, that opponent must tell you the next answer that they obtain regarding the X-File of your choice. The answer need not be a "yes" answer. Discard this card after you've obtained the answer.

card.name: HARD EVIDENCE
card.text: Add five tokens to your pool.

card.name: RELENTLESS PURSUIT
card.text: Play to prevent the opposing player from drawing cards after the player has paid, but before the cards are drawn. X = The number of cards that the opposing player has paid to draw.

card.name: COUNTERINTELLIGENCE MEASURES
card.text: Play this card after your opponent has asked a Characteristic Question regarding your X-File. After you answer the question, your opponent must answer the question as well. Your opponent may still guess your X-File identity if normally allowed to do so, but you may not.

card.name: DEDUCTIVE REASONING
card.text: Play on a Team that has just completed a combat. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check, then they may ask whether or not the Adversary has a Keyword that is the same as the AFFILIATION of the controller's X-File.

card.name: GRID PATTERN SEARCH
card.text: Select one card from your Discard Pile and place it in your hand.

card.name: DRIVING
card.text: Play on a Team in the Field during the Deploytment Phase. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check, they may investigate two Sites in the same state this turn.

card.name: IN-SERVICE TRAINING
card.text: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal, and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: COMPUTER, MEDICAL, or SCIENCES. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

card.name: REJUVENATING CAVES
card.text: Play this card next to the X-File you have chosen. Place ten tokens on this card. Beginning on your opponent's next turn you may take up to two tokens from this card and place them in your pool. The tokens become tokens. When all counters have been removed, discard this card.

card.name: ALIEN EXPERIMENTATION
card.text: Negate any one Keyword EVENT card.

card.name: HIDDEN GRAVE
card.text: Take any Witness from your opponent's Discard Pile and use it for one skill check immediately at no cost.

card.name: TRAP
card.text: Play on a Team in the Field at the start of combat. Force the opponent Team to make an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check. If they fail, the following combat will be fought between the Adversary and one Agent of your choice. No other Agents may participate in the combat.

card.name: X
card.text: Negate any one Keyword ADVERSARY card.

card.name: ASSIGNED TO THE X-FILES
card.text: Play to permanently add any one Agent from your hand to a Team. The normal rules for selecting an Agent sill apply. In addition, the Agent may not be one that was removed from the game prior to playing this card. X = Agent's Cost.

card.name: PLAGUE OF LOCUSTS
card.text: Force an opponent Team to make an OCCULT INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check. If they fail, negate all Witnesses that are modifying the Team's skill check.

card.name: X-FILES RESEARCH
card.text: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal, and in addition has a +1 in one of the folowing skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, OCCULT INVESTIGATION, or SCIENCES. This card may not be played on Agents Mulder or Scully. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

card.name: A FRIEND IN THE FBI
card.text: Play this card in the Bureau. Place ten tokens on this card. During your Briefing Phase you may take up to two tokens from this card and place them in your pool. The tokens become (change to) tokens. When all counters have been removed, discard this card.

card.name: WRITTEN REPORT
card.text: Play when an Agent is forced to return to the Bureau. Prior to moving, the Team may make a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check. If successful, the Agent does not have to return to the Bureau.

card.name: GOVERNMENT MINDWIPE SERUM
card.text: Force one opponent to discard all cards in their hand that contain the Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY.

card.name: TRAVEL ARRANGEMENTS
card.text: You may move one of your Agents to any Section immediately. This card may not be played once an Adversary has forced combat until after the combat is resolved. The Agent may join any Team that occupies the new Section.

card.name: DECOY
card.text: Play when an Adversary is allowed to enter combat with a single Agent. If the Team to which the Agent is attached makes a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check, the Adversary is negated.

card.name: AUTOPSY
card.text: Take a Witness from your Discard Pile and place it in your hand. In addition, if the Team makes a MEDICAL 4+ skill check, the Witness's modifier is doubled if played this turn.

card.name: EVASIVE MANEUVERS
card.text: Negate one non-PHENOMENA Adversary.

card.name: FROHIKE
card.text: This card will negate one Event card played on your Team.

card.name: AGENT REGGIE PURDUE FOUND STRANGLED
card.text: If your opponent includes Agent Purdue in any skill check in the Field, Agent Purdue is instantly killed and removed from the game.

card.name: ROAD HAZARD
card.text: Negate one card with the Keyword MOVE.

card.name: CORE TRAINING
card.text: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal, and in addtion has a +1 in one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

card.name: SAMUEL HARTLEY
card.text: Play on a Team in the Field that has just had an Agent removed from the game this turn. Make an OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check of 4+. If successful, the Agent remains in play.

card.name: TRUE GRIT
card.text: Play when an Agent is forced to go to the Hospital. He must still go to the Hospital by the end of this turn but he may add his skills to one skill check before going.

card.name: DECREASED WORKLOAD
card.text: Play during the Briefing Phase. One Team in the Bureau may make a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check. If successful, choose one Agent. The Agent now has a RES number equal to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill during the next Briefing Phase. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

card.name: LAPTOP COMPUTER
card.text: Adds 2 to the Agent's COMPUTER skill.

card.name: GAS CHROMATOGRAPH
card.text: Agents equipped with a Gas Chromatograph have access to the field office crime lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.

card.name: WIRE-TAP
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's SUBTERFUGE skill.

card.name: BINOCULARS
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill.

card.name: MEDI-KIT
card.text: An agent with MEDICAL skill may use the Medi-Kit to heal one wound on any agent in the Team once per turn. The may prevent an Agent from going to the Hospital.

card.name: KEVLAR VEST
card.text: The Kevlar Vest will absorb three points of damage. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to prevent one point of damage. Discard the Vest when all the tokens have been discarded. Excess damage is applied to the Agent as normal.

card.name: GLOCK 19 SEMI-AUTOMATIC PISTOL
card.text: Adds 2 to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill.

card.name: HIGH RESOLUTION CAMERA
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill.

card.name: HIGH-POWERED FLASHLIGHT
card.text: Adds 2 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill.

card.name: GOVERNMENT CAR
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.

card.name: KNIFE
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

card.name: TAPED INTELLIGENCE
card.text: Adds 2 to the Agent's BUREAUCRACY skill. GOVERNMENT Adversaries may now attack the Agent's Team when investigating a Site, even when thay would otherwise be barred from doing so.

card.name: WALTHER PPK 7.65 HOLD OUT WEAPON
card.text: Adds 2 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

card.name: GEIGER COUNTER
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill.

card.name: HOSPITAL CRASH CART
card.text: This piece of Equipment does not need to be attached to any Agent. Place three tokens on the Hospital Crash Cart. Discard one token to heal one point of damage to an Agent in the Hospital. Discard when all three tokens have been expended.

card.name: CELLULAR PHONE
card.text: The Agent may add his skills to a skill check that is occuring in another Section of the table. The Agent's skill is reduced by one (i.e.; Skill: 3 becomes Skill: 2). LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT may not be added.

card.name: SYMBOL OF FAITH
card.text: OCCULT Adversaries may not assign damage to this Agent unless there are no other eligible targets. If the Agent is the only eligible target then the damage from OCCULT Adversaries is halved.

card.name: ELECTRON EMISSION MICROSCOPE
card.text: Agents equipped with an Electron Emission Microscope have access to the field office crime lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL skill.

card.name: SHOTGUN
card.text: Adds 3 to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill once per combat. Damage may be split if there are multiple opponents (your choice).

card.name: MINI-14 ASSAULT RIFLE
card.text: Adds 2 to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill. Damage may be split if there are multiple opponents (your choice).

card.name: MOJO BAG
card.text: Subtract one point from each damaging hit caused by an OCCULT CREATURE. In addition, OCCULT Adversaries may not play combat cards on Agents equipped with a Mojo Bag.

card.name: LIE DETECTOR
card.text: Adds 1 to the Agent's BEHAVIORAL skill.

card.name: ALIEN HARVESTER
card.text: Your opponent may not spread out Agents until this card is resolved. Hold this card twelve inches up and twelve inches away from the opponent's Team. Flip the card so that it spins through the air. All of the Agents in the Investigating Team that are bing touched by the Alien Harvester are abducted! Discard any Equipment attached to the abducted Agents. The Agents are placed ten cards down, face up, in the Bureau deck. When the Agent cards reach the top of the deck, the Agents are immediately moved to the Hospital (though they are not damaged).

card.name: HUNTER IN THE DARK
card.text: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.

card.name: CREW-CUT MAN
card.text: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. The Crew-Cut Man may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards.

card.name: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
card.text: Each source of damage affecting the Alien Bounty Hunter in CLOSE RANGE COMBAT also causes 1 damage to each opposing Team member involved in the Combat (because he has poisonout blood). The Hunter may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE Cambat cards. If killed in Combat, place the Hunter back in your deck and shuffle.

card.name: THE HOST ATTACKS
card.text: Place five tokens on any Agent that loses HEALTH as a result of this creature's attack. Remove a token in each of that Agent's Briefing Phases. At the end of the turn in which the last token is removed, the Agent is removed from the game. This card can be negated by the Team containing the afflicted Agent making a MEDICAL 3+ skill check or by playing a HEALING card on the afflicted player prior to the Agent being removed.

card.name: PVT. MCALPIN, ZOMBIE
card.text: LONG RANGE COMBAT attacks cause only half damage (round up) to the Zombie.

card.name: GOOD PEOPLE, GOOD FOOD
card.text: Damage caused by this creature may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).

card.name: THE SANDMAN
card.text: The Creature has LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT equal to the highest Combat raing on the opposing team (including modifiers) +1. The Sandman may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

card.name: ABDUCTION
card.text: Pick one Agent in the Team. That Agent is placed ten cards down, face up, in the owning player's Bureau deck. Any equipment that Agent had is discarded. When the Agent's card reaches the top of the deck, the Agent is immediately moved to the Hospital (undamaged). This card does not initiate Combat.

card.name: SQUEEZE
card.text: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.

card.name: THE PSYCHOTIC ATTACK
card.text: Damage from LONG RANGE COMBAT may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).

card.name: THE MECHANIC
card.text: The Mechanic may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

card.name: DARKNESS FALLS
card.text: Unless a HEALING card is played immediately and the card results in one point being healed, move the Agent to the Hospital. The Agent must stay in the Hospital for the next turn.

card.name: SUPPRESSED FURY
card.text: Regardless of how much damage is done to this creature in the LONG RANGE COMBAT round, it will attack in the CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round. If its HEALTH has been exceeded, it is removed at the end of the CRC round.

card.name: LIVING MACHINE
card.text: Fight Combat as normal except skip LONG RANGE COMBAT and go straight to CLOSE RANGE COMBAT. Agents must use their COMPUTER skill as their value in CRC. If an Agent has no COMPUTER skill, his value is 1.

card.name: OPERATION FALCON BLUE BERETS
card.text: Damage caused by this creature may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice). The Blue Berets may use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards.

card.name: PHEROMONE-INDUCED PSYCHOSIS
card.text: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. The Witness card is discarded and the Team is attacked! The Creature's LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT are equal to the Witness's modifier. If the Witness has no modifier, treat the Witness as a +3.

card.name: DEADLY BLUR
card.text: Any Agent damaged by the Deadly Blur is placed in the Hospital for the next two turns regardless of how much HEALTH they have. Each opponent's LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT is reduced by one point. The Deadly Blur may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

card.name: THE MANITOU STALKS HIS PREY
card.text: Any Agent wounded by the Manitou may not heal wounds until a Healing card is successfully played on him.

card.name: POLTERGEIST ATTACK
card.text: The Poltergeist is unaffected by Combat attacks. It will attack for only one LONG RANGE COMBAT and one CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round and then is discarded.

card.name: KISS OF THE VAMPIRE
card.text: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. Discard the Witness card. The Witness actually becomes a lesser vampire that attacks the Team in conjunction with the master vampire, with a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT rating of 3 and a HEALTH rating of 3. LONG RANGE COMBAT will cause no damage to eiter vampire.
